title: Annual personal wellbeing estimates
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/office-for-national-statistics
summary: Estimates of life satisfaction, feeling that the things done in life are worthwhile, happiness and anxiety for adults aged 16 years and over, UK, 04/2011-03/2012 to 04/2022-03/2023.
description:
This dataset shows the average rating of those that feel satisfied about their lives (where 0 is 'not at all satisfied' and 10 is 'completely satisfied'), feel the things they do in life are worthwhile (where 0 is 'not at all worthwhile' and 10 is 'completely worthwhile'), felt happy yesterday (where 0 is 'not at all happy' and 10 is 'completely happy'), felt anxious yesterday (where 0 is 'not at all anxious' and 10 is 'completely anxious'), for adults aged 16 years and over, in the UK, for periods 04/2011-03/2012 to 04/2022-03/2023.

### Coverage 

UK

#### Geography definition

Local Authority Districts and Unitary Authorities,
Counties,
Regions,
Nations (England, Wales, Scotland, Northern Ireland),
Country (UK)

### Source

 - United Kingdom: [Office for National Statistics](https://www.ons.gov.uk/peoplepopulationandcommunity/wellbeing/bulletins/measuringnationalwellbeing/previousReleases)

Satisfaction mean score (where 10 is 'co.label: Life satisfaction
Satisfaction mean score (where 10 is 'co.subtitle: Average rating of life satisfaction (0 = 'not at all satisfied', 10 = 'completely satisfied') for people aged 16 and over
Satisfaction mean score (where 10 is 'co.longDescription: This indicator shows the average rating of those that feel satisfied about their lives (where 0 is 'not at all satisfied' and 10 is 'completely satisfied'), for adults aged 16 years and over, in the UK, for periods 04/2011-03/2012 to 04/2022-03/2023.

Happiness mean score (where 10 is 'compl.label: Happiness
Happiness mean score (where 10 is 'compl.subtitle: Average rating of life satisfaction (0 = 'not at all satisfied', 10 = 'completely satisfied') for people aged 16 and over
Happiness mean score (where 10 is 'compl.longDescription: This indicator shows the average rating of those that felt happy yesterday (where 0 is 'not at all happy' and 10 is 'completely happy'), for adults aged 16 years and over, in the UK, for periods 04/2011-03/2012 to 04/2022-03/2023.

Anxiety mean score (where 10 is 'complet.label: Anxiety
Anxiety mean score (where 10 is 'complet.subtitle: Average rating for anxiety during previous day (0 = 'not at all anxious', 10 = 'completely anxious') for people aged 16 and over
Anxiety mean score (where 10 is 'complet.longDescription: This indicator shows the average rating of those that felt anxious yesterday (where 0 is 'not at all anxious' and 10 is 'completely anxious'), for adults aged 16 years and over, in the UK, for periods 04/2011-03/2012 to 04/2022-03/2023.

Worthwhile mean score (where 10 is 'comp.label: Feeling life is worthwhile
Worthwhile mean score (where 10 is 'comp.subtitle: Average rating that the things they do in life are worthwhile (0 = 'not at all worthwhile', 10 = 'completely worthwhile') for people aged 16 and over
Worthwhile mean score (where 10 is 'comp.longDescription: This indicator shows the average rating of those that feel the things they do in life are worthwhile (where 0 is 'not at all worthwhile' and 10 is 'completely worthwhile'), for adults aged 16 years and over, in the UK, for periods 04/2011-03/2012 to 04/2022-03/2023.
